MediasourceRefreshAll Interface Reference
HTTP Query API for TVersity Services

Refresh all the media sources (do a full library refresh) More...

Detailed Description

Refresh all the media sources (do a full library refresh)

Path: /mediasource/refreshall

Returns:
An XML documnt with the top level element response and two attributes status and message. The status can be either success or failure and the message describes the cause of the error in a user friendly manner.
